PUT: /api/services
body: {
     title: 'A new title',
     description: 'A new description',
     category: 'FUN',
     location: '353 st',
     acceptable_radius: '2540',
     mygrant_value: '50',
     service_type: 'REQUEST',
     creator_id: '4'
}
